s: October 17, 2024 - The company revealed three deals, ... X-Energy and two development agreements that aim to add around 300 megawatts’ worth of capacity in both the Pacific Northwest and Virginia, two data center hot spots. The two development deals outline the construction of small modular reactors (SMR), which generate a fraction of the power produced by contemporary nuclear power plants but which proponents say will be faster and cheaper to build.
